meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>way</kanji> you <kanji>see</kanji> is the <vocabulary>way of seeing</vocabulary> something. This is like when someone has a dumb opinion and you're like "oh, okay, so that's one way of seeing it..."
readingMnemonic: This uses the kun'yomi readings from the vocab words 見る and 方. So as long as you're okay with those, you can apply that knowledge over here.
